OK: Pairwise correlation with existing submodels all below 0.25

OK: Features computed as designed:
- ie_change = T10YIE.diff() (daily change)
- ie_vol_5d = ie_change.rolling(5).std()
- ie_vol_10d = ie_change.rolling(10).std()
- ie_vol_20d = ie_change.rolling(20).std()
- gold_return = gc_close.pct_change() (current-day, not next-day)
- t5yifr_change = T5YIFR.diff()
OK: All raw features (T10YIE, T5YIFR, gc_close) from verified FRED/Yahoo sources
OK: Data split proportions match design:
- Total rows after warmup: 2924

- Test set: ~439 rows (15%)
OK: Metadata records exact data provenance and quality metrics
